bibl.title: Quantifying the Roman Economy. Methods and Problems. (Oxford Studies on the Roman Economy.)
bibl.note: 15 contributions and 2 responses, originally from a colloquium held at the Ashmolean Museum and the Classics Centre in Oxford in September 2006, as part of a research programme entitled "The Economy of the Roman Empire: Integration, Growth and Decline".
bibl.seg: BOWMAN Alan and Andrew WILSON (Edd.), Quantifying the Roman Economy. Methods and Problems. (Oxford Studies on the Roman Economy.)
Oxford, Oxford University Press, 2009, 8°, xviii-356 pp., tabl., nombr. fig. ISBN 978-0-19-956259-6. £60.

15 contributions and 2 responses, originally from a colloquium held at the Ashmolean Museum and the Classics Centre in Oxford in September 2006, as part of a research programme entitled "The Economy of the Roman Empire: Integration, Growth and Decline".
